transcript:
Customer: Hello madam.
Executive: Haan ji haan sir dekhiye aapko maine ek buylead bhi reverse kar diya hai aur sath mein jo do char cheeze maine aapko batayi hai na ki aap thoda sa review pe kaam kariye jo bhi aapke do buyer bane hain unse feedback le lijiye apne review wala bata diya na sir kaise karna hai review.
Customer: Achcha wo to theek hai madam par lead ek se kuch kaam nahi chalega madam aise to fir kya matlab hai aap kam se kam do lead badhaiye hamare.
Executive: Sir ek lead ke sath dusri lead bhi to hamare kharab ho gaye na hamare to system hai.
Customer: Haan wo main samajh rahi hu lekin sir wo cheez to hota hi hai na aap to maan ke chaliye agar aapko hafte ka 17 lead mil raha hai to 17 ke 17 buyer nahi sahi honge wo har jagah sir aisa hai kyuki buyer hai na sir aap har buyer ko thodi aapse saman le lega usme se mushkil se aate hain do teen buyer saman lete hain aapse baki to kuch na kuch bahana karke chale jaate hain.
Executive: Ek wo 17 mere se kam se kam panch jane le le sahi bahut apne byaj ka paisa nikal de aapka.
Executive: Nikal jayega sir nikal jayega main bata rahi hu na ki shuruat ka jo aapka mahine hai waha pe aap basic cheezo pe kaam kar lijiye jaise review achcha kar lijiye hai na follow up client ka achcha banaiye ki aage chal ke wo aapko order de hai na sir achche se maintain rakhiye sir sab badhiya hoga isme aur aapka to sir ye itna aap bata rahe ho purana business hai to aapko to achche se pakad bhi hoga ki kya kya client ko batana hota hai.
Customer: Wo to maine pakad achchi hai baki kuch na farzi aa jaate hai na aapke tabhi to dikkat aati hai farzi client nahi aate to hame koi dikkat bhi nahi rehti hai.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai ki sare hi farzi waise milenge do char to sir do char rehte hain sir online platform hai na usme hum number unka verify karte hain sab kuch karte hain lekin aap samajh rahe hain na log apna fake number bhi laga lete hain to wo dikkat hai isiliye to aapko sara cheez guide karte hain sir ki jab aap payment wagera ka kariye to sara kuch verify karke kariyega kyuki kuch kuch dikkate to hum bhi log face hi kar rahe hain sir lekin usko improve bhi kar rahe hain timely aap jaise aapne feedback diya Praveen ji ka Praveen ji ko block kar diya jayega main aage apni team ko bhejungi hai na sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan to hum cheeze karenge sir aap hume timely update dete rahiye ki hume ye dikkat aa raha hai hum usko theek karte jayenge theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay madam.
Executive: Theek hai sir haan abhi ke liye sir aap bhi samajhiye thoda hamari bhi cheezo ko samajhiye abhi.
Customer: Madam main samajh raha hu meri taraf se koi dikkat aapko main de raha na bhai jab dikkat aati hai tabhi aapko call karta hu bhai hume ye lead chahiye extra ab aapse main do lead mang raha hu to aap mujhe ek lead de rahe ho.
Executive: Aapne sir chalo panch lead tak main bhi samajh sakta hu panch lead nahi ho sakte uska possible nahi to do to ho sakte hain madam.
Executive: Sir yaha par na ek bhi nahi hota hai bas mere paas ek lead bacha tha to maine kar diya kyuki ek hota hai na ki aapke paas ek option hota hai hume milta hai ki pure din mein jarur koi na koi client aise hote hain jinko koi lead kharab ho gaya hai unko jarurat hai hai na to us situation mein ek lead hamare paas rehta hai to wo maine aapko diya hai ek hi sirf milta hai to wo maine aapko de diya bina mange ki kisi ko kaam aa jayega agar mere paas haan bataiye.
Customer: Yaadi kal bhi aisa hi ho gaya to aise farzi customer mil gaye to.
Executive: Nahi fir nahi ho payega sir ye cheez baar baar hum nahi kar sakte wahi to dikkat hai na sir nahi to mujhe kya tha agar main haan.
Customer: Are to fir waste ho rahi hai na aap keh rahe ho aisa baar baar nahi ho sakta hamari lead to waste kharab ho gayi uske liye uske liye sir aapko kitne rupay liye hamare se 85000 ke kam se kam liye the na.
Executive: Hmm hmm uske liye sir yahi samadhan hai ki hamare sare lead aise nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha sir main wahi keh rahi hu na 10 mein aath koi clients to answer karte hain ek do aise nikalte hain na jo aapka call nahi utha rahe hain to ek do ke liye hum kya kar sakte hain sir aapko bhi aapka hi number hai sir aap hamesha thodi call pe active rehte honge kai baar aap bhi call chhod dete honge nahi uthate honge to aise hi buyer bhi hai kai baar wo nahi call uthata hai to iska matlab ye nahi hai ki wo fake nikal gaya.
Customer: Hmm theek hai madam hum mante hai bhai ek do ek do ya call nahi utha koi bhi aadmi maine aapko ek aur customer bataya tha Jodhpur ka tha army mein tha unse baat hui wo farzi nikla uska kya kare.
Executive: Theek hai uske liye wahi hai matlab block kiya aapne.
Customer: Hmm main usse aap se ki hum meri lead badhaiye.
Executive: Sir isme lead nahi hai aapko ye lead badhana hai to fir package aapko sir badhana padega ki aap ek thoda sa aur bada package lo usme aur bhi jyada buylead milta hai lekin aap maan ke chalo sir 100% nahi milta hai koi bhi lead hai na usme online platform mein 80% hota hai 90% hota hai 100% nahi hota hai ki 100% aapka jo lead hai wo sahi hi hoga.
Customer: To ya madam main ya mere paas abhi wo dusre company ko bhi call aate hain wo kehte hain sir hum 100% aapko denge.
Executive: Ye koi kar hi nahi sakta sir online platform pe 100% lead thik aa hi nahi sakti aap khud ka apna website dal ke dekh lijiye agar aapko vishwas nahi hai to aap apna website banaiye aapko 100% sahi lead nahi aayegi usme kuch log inquiry kar rahe honge kuch log aise hi pata kar rahe honge kuch log usi mein job mangne lagte hain ki aapke company mein job hai kya hai na to alag alag sir rehta hai aisa nahi hai ki 100% kyuki online kya hai na ki aapko all India visibility mila hua hai all India se kisko jo bhi jarurat rahega log call kar dete hain kuch fraud karne ke liye kar dete hain to isiliye to main aapko guide bhi karti rehti hu ki sir is tarah ke call aayenge to aap isko ignore kar dijiyega wo hota hai sir.
Customer: Job ke liye aate hai to unko job mil jayenge hamare paas wo job ke liye koi aapke.
Executive: Haan ji ji nahi wahi main keh rahi hu lekin wo bhi sir risky hai online mein aaya hai job bole fir bolega OTP de do ye kar do wo kar do hai na to bahut sari cheeze hain sir wahi cheez main keh rahi hu 100% accuracy nahi hoti hai sir 80% 90% hota hai ki 80% 90% lead theek hai aur wo har platform hai sir koi bhi agar bol raha hai na 100% sahi aata hai to wo jhoot bol raha hai.
Customer: To aapke Suraj ne mujhe aisa kaha 100% aayega to aap jhoot bol rahe the hamare sath dhokha kiya aapne sath.
Executive: Ab sir ye to aapko khud pata hona chahiye ki 100% kaise koi cheez theek ho sakti hai agar aap sir aap aapke company ke member se to humne kaha bhai 100% hoga Suraj ne 100% kaha ki 100% sahi customer denge verified customer denge.
Executive: Achcha to fir ya mujhe aapke sath aapke company ke upar case lagana padega dhokhadhari ka.
Executive: Nahi sir iske liye case kya lagana hai aapne hamare sath dhokha kiya.
Executive: Nahi nahi main wo keh rahi hu sir ki aapko lead to hum pura de hi rahe hain na sare koi ek ka dukka hi hota hai na jo aapse baat nahi kiya ya is tarah ka lead nikal gaya hai na wo main keh rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai koi nahi hai next time ya aap mere do lead kar lo madam ek lead aisa kar lo isme kya dikkat hai aapko main ek lead to do lead extra mang raha hu aapse.
Executive: Sir wahi main keh rahi hu na agar possible hota to main kyu nahi kar deti aap batao sir mere jeb se jana hai mere jeb se nahi jana hai na to mujhe kya dikkat thi karne mein.
Customer: Keh raha madam aapke manager se baat karo bhai aapka customer mana kar raha hai jhagda kar raha hai hamare se.
Executive: Maine baat karne ke baad hi sir aapko bola hai ki ye cheez nahi ek ka maine bol diya usi ke liye mujhe padega daant nahi hota hai sir wo to mere paas tha to maine kar diya aapke paas se.
Customer: Farzi customer mang raha hai bhai farzi call aayega to matlab kya uska mere paise laga dene ka matlab kya hai.
Executive: To aap batao na kaun sa farzi hai isme aapne ek Praveen ka bataya maine aapko kiya na baki agar aap koi dusra naam doge to hamare internal team ne uske liye mail wagera chalega ki ye kaun si lead hai kya galat hai kya hai wo check karke batayenge wo bahut lamba process hota hai maine to turant ka turant aapko ek mere paas balance tha to maine de diya baki aap kisi aur lead ko aap bol rahe ho fake hai to aap batao naam main check karati hu apne team se.
Customer: Theek hai madam main aapko message karta hu kaun kaun si hai.
Executive: Haan aap mujhe bhejiye sir main usko apne team mein bhejungi fir wo decide karenge unko kya karna hai mere jo hath mein tha wo maine kar diya theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Abhi ke liye sir main aapka ye wala concern close karu na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai to abhi sir aap mere se to satisfy hain na mere se to koi dikkat nahi hai aapko.
Customer: Chalo main aapko chala leta hu koi dikkat nahi hai next time main aapko call karunga mujhe ek lead mein ek kharab ho to mujhe do bonus mein deni padegi aapko ek extra lead free dena padega.
Executive: Do ka hota nahi hai lekin main apne team ko jarur main usme apne senior ko shamil karungi theek hai next call mein agar next kabhi hua to main apne senior ko haan.
Customer: Lagegi sath mein.
Executive: Haan bilkul bilkul sir usme main aapko apne senior se baat karwa dungi agar aapke sath aisa kuch hua abhi ke liye sir please aap achcha mere abhi mere liye aapke paas feedback aayega aapke whatsapp pe ya gmail id pe sir aayega aapka jo gmail id hai na waha pe to please sir mere liye to achcha feedback dijiyega mere se to koi dikkat nahi hai na aapko.
Customer: Madam dikkat hai na mere ek lead aapne badhai nahi abhi tak ek lead aapne batai main do lead ka kab se keh raha hu aap se pehle panch ka keh raha tha panch to main bhi samajhta hu panch nahi hai do to ho sakte hain madam.
Executive: Sir wahi cheez hai na main company ki malik thodi hu company ke kuch rule hote hain sir kuch rule ke according chalna hota hai na sir.
Customer: Baat hi sara rules hota hai theek hai na.
Executive: Nahi main aapko bata rahi hu na aap kuch.
Customer: Main wahi keh rahi hu sir aap main kis basis pe aapko kaise main bolu aage main apne team ko aap mujhe naam likh ke dijiyega jaisa aap bata rahe hain theek hai ki is customer ye customer mere hisab se fake hai theek hai wo main apne team ko mail dalungi mere senior usko dekhenge ki kahan se ye buylead aayi thi verification hua tha ki nahi us basis pe wo aapko karke denge theek hai sir ye main aapko bolti hu ye to theek hai na sir mujhe bhi to kuch dikhana hoga to main turant ye mail kar dungi ab theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir madam aapko main bhejta hu 10-15 minute ke andar.
Executive: Hello haan theek hai madam theek hai.
Customer: Hello haan madam okay theek hai main aapko kar leta hu aawaz aa rahi hai madam meri.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs additional buyleads.

- Customer complains about fake leads.



Resolution:

- Executive reversed one buylead.

- Executive assured to block reported fake leads.

- Executive explained the process of reporting fake leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details of fake leads.



Alert (If Any):

- complaint



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, fake leads, subscription, resolution
